channel.title: The only file in BMS is the .7z file HELP
channel.description:
When I run the setup it only puts one file (BlackMesa.7z) into C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS
Should it not be installing other files to the BMS directory?
I've scoured the internet and cannot for the life of me figure this out.
I install it to the default folder. After the setup is done, I restart steam and that stupid "gameinfo.txt is missing" screen pops up.
HELP ME. 0_o
